known_issues: Topic/Date/Time input fields appear visually heavy (font weight/prominence) and slightly unbalance the form layout

existing_features.title: Adjust the Study Planner “Add Study Task” form so that the Topic, Date, and Time fields appear visually lighter without changing layout structure or component sizing: (a) set the input text font weight to normal (400) for the Topic input and the Date/Time inputs, (b) reduce the corresponding Label font weight so it is not bold, (c) ensure these fields use padding consistent with the other form fields, (d) keep the existing input height (do not resize the container), and (e) keep the same border radius and existing color scheme. Apply changes only to Topic/Date/Time fields and do not affect the Subject dropdown styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust Topic/Date/Time input fields to reduce visual heaviness (lighter font weights, consistent padding) without changing layout, sizing, border radius, color scheme, or subject dropdown styling

projectName: Lighten visual weight of Topic/Date/Time fields in Study Planner form
